 Description:

 Kingdom of Lemuria in despair ( story). Black Queen stole the sun , moon and stars . You play for Aurora , young princess with a pure heart , with all my heart that cares for the kingdom of Lemuria . Go hiking , whose purpose - the return of the three light sources. Defeat the black queen and restore the kingdom of Lemuria .


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 - Cut : nothing
 - Recoded : nothing
